bibl.note: Insurance Company of North America Records, 1792 December 1-1843 February 18

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Know all Men by these presents that I, Samuel B. Breese of Shrewsburg, in the County of Monmouth and State of New Jersey, have made ordained, constituted, and by these presents do make, ordain and Consitute, and in my place and stead put and diputeEbenezer Hazard of Philadelphia my true and lawfull attorney for me, and in my name to sell assign and transfer the whole or any part of the stock standing in my name on the books of the president and directors of the Insurance Company of North America, In witness whereof I have hereunto set my hand &seal this 9th day of February. In the year of our Lord one thousand and seven hundred &ninety nine
Sealed and delivered in the presence of

Be it Known that this Ninth Day of February in the year of our Lord one thousand seven hundred and ninety nine personally appeared before me Samuel Breese Esquire one of the Judges of the Superior Court of commopytion and for the County of Monmouth &State of New Jersey Samuel B. Breese. subscribing party to the above power of attorney. who acknowledged he sealed and delivered the same as his voluntary act I deed for the purpose therein Contained.
